msContents.summary: The manuscript contains aphoristic rules of Prākṛta Language which is referred as ṣaṭbhāṣā in the initial verses of the manuscript. The authorship of the text is not confirmed according to the New Catalogus Catalogorum volume 13 p-142. This text is published with the commentary of Siṃharāja's Prākṛtarūpāvatāra but seems that the last verses are mainly part of the Vālmīkisūtra.

msItem.title: Prākṛtavyākaraṇa Vālmīkisūtra
msItem.author: Vālmīki
msItem.rubric: (1v 1) śubhamastu śrīhayagrīvāya namaḥ śrīmate vālmikaye namaḥ yena śrīrāmacaritramadhigamya suracitaṃ śrīmadrāmāyaṇaṃ proktaṃ (1v 2) tasmai vālmikaye namaḥ yena nirmmalitā gāvaḥ ṣaṭbhāṣākṛtaye sautrāṇāṃ vimalaiḥ sūtrakṛtakaistasmai vālmikaye namaḥ sthānasya (1v 3) kāvyena girāñca ṣaṇṇāṃ sutrai nirāṇā? kulaṣaṃ prapatyaṃ parākarotya prathamaṃ vālmikimenaṃ munimānatosmi
msItem.incipit: (1v 4) siddhirlokkacca anuktamanyaśabdānuśāsanavat atha sañjāvṛtyāha rambhiya? supsvādirantyahalā ho hrasvaḥ didī (1v 5) rghaḥ
msItem.explicit: (17r 4) ..... passagṛhṇau dṛśigrahoḥ nakṣa (illegible due to sticker of shelf mark.) lvādiśrostāruccāralāghavaṃ bindorṇa (17r 5) ? lyendaṃ liṅgamanantra? śaurasenivat tadvatyayaścāśeṣaṃ saṃskṛtavat [??gāsta?] (illegible due to sticker of shelf mark.) [sasitvā?]
msItem.finalRubric: (17r 5) iti tṛtīyasyādyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ (17r 6) prāṇapradaṃprāggabadvālmikīpramukhāṃbhujādmākulayat sūtrākhyamadvavadyareva? hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu
